data.text:
Carnatic vocal music is a popular genre of classical music that is associated with the Southern regions of India. With IndianRaga a platform for learning the art of classical music and dance, you can learn Carnatic classical music online with renowned Gurus that develop your skills in Carnatic vocals. Our classes at Raga Labs Academy will take you through the entire process of vocal training, from basics to techniques and singing popular songs. You can now attend the online Carnatic music classes at the convenience of your home at a time slot that works best for you.

A demo class is conducted as a basic assessment and guidance for all those who are new to Carnatic vocal lessons. We provide certifications upon completion of each course, with batches ranging from beginners to advanced levels. With no age restrictions to learn and one-on-one mentorships, we train you to bring out the uniqueness in your vocals along with implementing the traditional techniques of Indian Carnatic music.

Carnatic Music, also known as Karnatak / Karnatic music is a popular classical genre that roots in South India. It is an authentic traditional technique with a focus on the three important factors of vocals- skill, rhythm, and expressions (raga, tala, and bhava). Carnatic music has a rich history in performing arts with techniques that have remained the same over the years, and it still has a massive influence on Indian arts to date. While most classical genres are accompanied by instruments; there are few to zero instruments accompanied by Carnatic music, and it is oriented towards the vocals. Carnatic Music is an Indian classical genre that musicians learn and perform across the world and with the best online Carnatic music lessons, you can soon become a pro, too.

1. Beginner to Advance Levels – Whether you’re starting with the basics of learning Carnatic music online, or you’re looking forward to excelling at your levels and polishing your skills. We offer classes of all levels ranging from beginner to advanced.

2. Classes held by Reputed Musicians and Instructors – Get vocally trained by leading artists and top instructors in the performing arts industry. Start your music journey with us, explore your vocal range, and get closer to becoming a professional at every level.

3. One-on-One Mentorship – Each student is trained with a one-on-one mentorship to work on your personal improvements, have all your questions answered, and enhance your skills.

4. Flexible Timings – With our flexible time slots, you can now learn Indian Carnatic classical music online at home at a time that is convenient for you.

5. Certifications and Placements for Renowned Events and Talent Contests – Certificates of completion are provided at the end of every level. What’s more? We direct you to events and talent contests that give you exposure to the music industry, as you complete the entire syllabus with Raga Labs. With our Carnatic music classes, we help you grow as an artist.
